author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two motorists were killed in separate accidents on Monday. Anthony (47), who was seated pillion on the motorcycle driven by his son Daniel (23), died on the spot after a car rammed the motorcycle at Dargas on Tambaram – Somangalam road.

They were residents of Melakottaiyur village near Kelambakkam. Daniel was injured on the neck and face and was rushed to Tambaram Taluk Government Hospital in Chromepet and later referred to Rajiv Gandhi Government General Hospital in the city, police said.

Elsewhere, on Pallavaram-Thoraipakkam Radial Road, 40-year-old Siva died on the spot when the motorcycle he was driving rammed a Metropolitan Transport Corporation bus.

Siva was working at a restaurant in Keelkattalai.
title: 2 die in accidents
